resources.string:
AsciiCam 1.2.3
Â© 2012-2017 Brian Nenninger

Comments and bug reports: bnenning@gmail.com

Source Code: https://github.com/dozingcat/AsciiCam

To take a picture, touch the shutter icon in the upper left. The smaller icons under the shutter in order are:
- Color: Cycles between color modes of black and white, primary colors only, and all colors.
- Settings: Allows you to change the characters used to display the image. You can use different characters for each color mode. There is also an option to automatically create ASCII images from pictures you take with the standard camera app.
- Gallery: Shows a list of all the pictures you've taken. Touch an image to view it full screen, where you will have the option to delete it, or share it as an image, HTML, or text.
- Convert to ASCII: Allows you to select an existing picture on your device, which will be converted to an ASCII image. (The original file will not be modified).
- Switch Camera: Switches between rear and front facing cameras.

AsciiCam contains code and images from the Android Open Source Project, used under the terms of the Apache License, Version 2.0: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.

Color wheel image by Mazenl77 from http://findicons.com/pack/679/nx10, used under the Creative Commons CC-BY license. Convert icon by Oxygen Icons from http://openiconlibrary.sourceforge.net/gallery2/?./Icons/actions/format-font-size-less.png, used under the Creative Commons CC-BY-SA license. Material icons from https://design.google.com/icons/, used under the Creative Commons CC-BY license.
You have not saved any pictures yet.
How do you want to share this picture?
Characters for white on black mode.
Enter characters to use for white on black images from darkest to brightest, or leave blank for the default of .:oO8@
Characters for black on white mode.
Enter characters to use for black on white images from darkest to brightest, or leave blank for the default of #o:..
Enter characters to use in images from darkest to brightest, or leave blank for the default of .:oO8@
Enter characters to use in images from darkest to brightest. Full color mode usually works best with fewer or even just one character. Leave blank for default of O8@
"AsciiCam cannot run without permission to use the camera.
AsciiCam needs permission to access storage in order to save photos.
AsciiCam needs permission to access storage in order to show your photo library.
